comments.author: tippytoes
comments.body: P2E gaming platforms are still getting interest as the gaming community around the globe is huge. However, not all P2E platforms will achieve success on this field. So what do you think will be your unique edge over the existing and known P2E gaming platform, let's say Axie infinity?
